snippet: Seattle quarterback Russell Wilson was 31 seconds from an N.F.C. championship game after engineering a come-from-behind touchdown against Atlanta.
abstract: Seattle Seahawks rookie quarterback Russell Wilson shows talent and poise in playoff loss to Atlanta Falcons; third-round draft selections are not supposed to start immediately at the increasingly complex position, much less advance their teams into title contention; yet Seahawks won six straight games, while becoming a fashionable pick to surface in the Super Bowl.
lead_paragraph: Seattle quarterback Russell Wilson was 31 seconds from an N.F.C. championship game after engineering a come-from-behind touchdown against Atlanta.

headline.seo: Russell Wilson of Seahawks Shows Talent and Poise in Loss
headline.main: Wilson Already Looking Ahead to Beginning His Sophomore Season
headline.print_headline: Wilson Already Looking Ahead to Beginning His Sophomore Season
